localize.title: Buzzing on Product Hunt
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Product Hunt in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: A lot of apps help you schedule your day but very few can help you with what should go into your schedule. We remind you of the small things, like doing laundry or paying your bills, so you don't have to sweat the small things.
blogPost.body: A lot of apps help you schedule your day but very few can help you with what should go into your schedule. We remind you of the small things, like doing laundry or paying your bills, so you don't have to sweat the small things.
blogPost.title: AI Adulting - Personalised reminders to adult, powered by machine learning
blogPost.author: Michael Davies
